title: Heartbeat Configuration
description: Configure heartbeat requests sent to upstream providers to keep their caches alive.

config.title: Heartbeat Configuration
config.description: The system automatically saves successful requests as curl commands. You can select one for heartbeat sending.

form.description: The heartbeat feature periodically sends the selected curl command to keep upstream token caches alive.

enabled.label: Enable Heartbeat
enabled.description: When enabled, the system will periodically send the selected curl command as heartbeat.

intervalSeconds.label: Heartbeat Interval (seconds)
intervalSeconds.description: Interval between heartbeat requests, range: 10-3600 seconds.

savedCurls.label: Saved Requests
savedCurls.description: Select a successful request for heartbeat sending (up to 20 saved).

form.intervalOutOfRange: Heartbeat interval must be between 10-3600 seconds
form.noCurlSelected: Please select a curl command for heartbeat
form.noCurls: No saved requests yet. Please send a successful request first.
